topItems.excerpt: During this video we will learn, how we can easily publish our Power BI report using PowerShell command. topItems.title: Get List of All Workspaces as an Admin Using Windows PowerShell | PowerShell and Power BI
topItems.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can get the list of All the available Workspaces in Power BI tenant. Power BI provides PowerShell Administrator API.
